misc: Always a gentleman despite occasionally losing his temper on the course
biography: Daniel, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, hails from Oulujokilaakson Golfklubi ry and brings a unique blend of competitiveness and sportsmanship to the greens.

With 7 past appearances, Daniel is a seasoned veteran of the tournament, having secured the coveted Hector Trophée twice. While the Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, his consistent performance makes him a formidable opponent.

Known for his gentlemanly conduct, Daniel occasionally battles his temper on the course, a testament to his passionate pursuit of excellence. Although he is not currently slated to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, the possibility of a last-minute entry remains, leaving fans eager for his potential return.
